File.Name: Contribution.aspx
File.AllUsersWebPart: <WebPart xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2"> <FrameType>None</FrameType> <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=12.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly> <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName> <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor"><div class="ms-dashboard-header"><p>The Contribution dashboard displays the various contributions by team members to help you track progress toward completing your project.</p></div></Content> </WebPart>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <WebPart xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2"> <Title>Contribution By Team Member Report</Title> <FrameType>Default</FrameType> <Description>Displays Reporting Services Contribution By Team Member Report.</Description> <IsIncluded>true</IsIncluded> <ZoneID>Header</ZoneID> <PartOrder>0</PartOrder> <FrameState>Normal</FrameState> <Height>600pt</Height> <Width>850pt</Width> <AllowRemove>false</AllowRemove> <AllowZoneChange>false</AllowZoneChange> <AllowMinimize>false</AllowMinimize> <AllowConnect>false</AllowConnect> <AllowEdit>false</AllowEdit> <AllowHide>false</AllowHide> <IsVisible>true</IsVisible> <DetailLink>../_layouts/TfsRedirect.aspx?tf%3aType=Report&tf%3aReportName=Project+Management%2fContribution+By+Team+Member&tf%3aShowToolbar=1&IsDashboard=false</DetailLink> <HelpLink /> <HelpMode>Modeless</HelpMode> <Dir>Default</Dir> <PartImageSmall /> <MissingAssembly>Cannot import this Web Part.</MissingAssembly> <PartImageLarge>/_layouts/images/mscntvwl.gif</PartImageLarge> <IsIncludedFilter /> <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=12.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly> <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.PageViewerWebPart</TypeName> <ContentLink xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/PageViewer">~site/_layouts/TfsRedirect.aspx?tf:Type=Report&tf:ReportName=Project Management/Contribution By Team Member&tf:ShowToolbar=0&IsDashboard=true</ContentLink> <SourceType xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/PageViewer">URL</SourceType> </WebPart>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts.WorkItemSummaryWebPart, Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="PersistenceStorage" type="string"><properties><property name="QS/WPQ/C" value="field=name%3DSystem.Id%26width%3D70&amp;field=name%3DSystem.Title%26width%3D450&amp;order=name%3DSystem.Id%26dir%3Dasc" /></properties></property> <property name="Query" type="string">SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title] FROM WorkItems WHERE ([System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Test Case' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Use Case' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Requirement' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Change Request' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Support Ticket')) ORDER BY [System.Id]</property> <property name="QueryTimeOut" type="int">10</property> <property name="ServerQuery" type="bool">False</property> <property name="Title" type="string">Project Work Items;</property> <property name="Width" type="unit">188pt</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts.CompletedBuildsWebPart, Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Columns" type="string">Status|Name</property> <property name="DateFilter" type="string">l7d</property> <property name="DisplayColumnHeaders" type="bool">True</property> <property name="NumberOfItems" type="int">5</property> <property name="Title" type="string">Recent Builds</property> <property name="Width" type="unit">188pt</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts.RecentCheckinsWebPart, Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Columns" type="string">ChangesetId|Comment</property> <property name="DateFilter" type="string">*</property> <property name="DisplayColumnHeaders" type="bool">True</property> <property name="NumberOfItems" type="int">5</property> <property name="Title" type="string">Recent Checkins</property> <property name="Width" type="unit">188pt</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

File.Name: Traceability.aspx
File.AllUsersWebPart: <WebPart xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2"> <FrameType>None</FrameType> <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=12.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly> <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName> <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor"><div class="ms-dashboard-header"><p>The Requirements Traceability dashboard displays each requirement's design, implementation and test cases to help you track progress toward completing your project.</p></div></Content> </WebPart>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <WebPart xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2"> <Title>Requirements Traceability Report</Title> <FrameType>Default</FrameType> <Description>Displays Reporting Services Requirements Traceability Report.</Description> <IsIncluded>true</IsIncluded> <ZoneID>Header</ZoneID> <PartOrder>0</PartOrder> <FrameState>Normal</FrameState> <Height>550pt</Height> <Width /> <AllowRemove>false</AllowRemove> <AllowZoneChange>false</AllowZoneChange> <AllowMinimize>false</AllowMinimize> <AllowConnect>false</AllowConnect> <AllowEdit>false</AllowEdit> <AllowHide>false</AllowHide> <IsVisible>true</IsVisible> <DetailLink>../_layouts/TfsRedirect.aspx?tf%3aType=Report&tf%3aReportName=Project+Management%2fRequirements+Traceability&tf%3aShowToolbar=1&IsDashboard=false&ExpandOrCollapse=Expand</DetailLink> <HelpLink /> <HelpMode>Modeless</HelpMode> <Dir>Default</Dir> <PartImageSmall /> <MissingAssembly>Cannot import this Web Part.</MissingAssembly> <PartImageLarge>/_layouts/images/mscntvwl.gif</PartImageLarge> <IsIncludedFilter /> <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=12.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly> <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.PageViewerWebPart</TypeName> <ContentLink xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/PageViewer">~site/_layouts/TfsRedirect.aspx?tf:Type=Report&tf:ReportName=Project Management/Requirements Traceability&tf:ShowToolbar=0&IsDashboard=true</ContentLink> <SourceType xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/PageViewer">URL</SourceType> </WebPart>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts.WorkItemSummaryWebPart, Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="PersistenceStorage" type="string"><properties><property name="QS/WPQ/C" value="field=name%3DSystem.Id%26width%3D70&amp;field=name%3DSystem.Title%26width%3D450&amp;order=name%3DSystem.Id%26dir%3Dasc" /></properties></property> <property name="Query" type="string">SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title] FROM WorkItems WHERE ([System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Test Case' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Use Case' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Requirement' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Change Request' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Support Ticket')) ORDER BY [System.Id]</property> <property name="QueryTimeOut" type="int">10</property> <property name="ServerQuery" type="bool">False</property> <property name="Title" type="string">Project Work Items;</property> <property name="Width" type="unit">188pt</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts.CompletedBuildsWebPart, Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Columns" type="string">Status|Name</property> <property name="DateFilter" type="string">l7d</property> <property name="DisplayColumnHeaders" type="bool">True</property> <property name="NumberOfItems" type="int">5</property>
<property name="Title" type="string">Recent Builds</property> <property name="Width" type="unit">188pt</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts.RecentCheckinsWebPart, Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WebAccess.WebParts, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Columns" type="string">ChangesetId|Comment</property> <property name="DateFilter" type="string">*</property> <property name="DisplayColumnHeaders" type="bool">True</property> <property name="NumberOfItems" type="int">5</property> <property name="Title" type="string">Recent Checkins</property> <property name="Width" type="unit">188pt</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>
